argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_simpl | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> A e. CC ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_sincld | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> ( sin ` A ) e. CC ) |
| 3 |  | #P_cosf | |- cos : CC --> CC |
| 4 | 3 | #P_a1i | |- ( A e. CC -> cos : CC --> CC ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_ffvelrnda | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> ( cos ` B ) e. CC ) |
| 6 | 2, 5 | #P_mulcld | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( cos ` B ) ) e. CC ) |
| 7 | 1 | #P_coscld | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> ( cos ` A ) e. CC ) |
| 8 |  | #P_sinf | |- sin : CC --> CC |
| 9 | 8 | #P_a1i | |- ( A e. CC -> sin : CC --> CC ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_ffvelrnda | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> ( sin ` B ) e. CC ) |
| 11 | 7, 10 | #P_mulcld | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( sin ` B ) ) e. CC ) |
| 12 | 6, 11, 6 | #P_ppncand | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> ( ( ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( cos ` B ) ) + ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( sin ` B ) ) ) + ( ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( cos ` B ) ) - ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( sin ` B ) ) ) ) = ( ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( cos ` B ) ) + ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( cos ` B ) ) ) ) |
| 13 |  | #P_sinadd | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> ( sin ` ( A + B ) ) = ( ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( cos ` B ) ) + ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( sin ` B ) ) ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_sinsub | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> ( sin ` ( A - B ) ) = ( ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( cos ` B ) ) - ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( sin ` B ) ) ) ) |
| 15 | 13, 14 | #P_oveq12d | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> ( ( sin ` ( A + B ) ) + ( sin ` ( A - B ) ) ) = ( ( ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( cos ` B ) ) + ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( sin ` B ) ) ) + ( ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( cos ` B ) ) - ( ( cos ` A ) x. ( sin ` B ) ) ) ) ) |
| 16 | 6 | #P_2timesd | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> ( 2 x. ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( cos ` B ) ) ) = ( ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( cos ` B ) ) + ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( cos ` B ) ) ) ) |
| 17 | 12, 15, 16 | #P_3eqtr4d | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> ( ( sin ` ( A + B ) ) + ( sin ` ( A - B ) ) ) = ( 2 x. ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( cos ` B ) ) ) ) |
| 18 | 17 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> ( ( ( sin ` ( A + B ) ) + ( sin ` ( A - B ) ) ) / 2 ) = ( ( 2 x. ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( cos ` B ) ) ) / 2 ) ) |
| 19 |  | #P_2cnd | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> 2 e. CC ) |
| 20 |  | #P_2ne0 | |- 2 =/= 0 |
| 21 | 20 | #P_a1i | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> 2 =/= 0 ) |
| 22 | 6, 19, 21 | #P_divcan3d | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> ( ( 2 x. ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( cos ` B ) ) ) / 2 ) = ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( cos ` B ) ) ) |
| 23 | 18, 22 | #P_eqtr2d | |- ( ( A e. CC /\ B e. CC ) -> ( ( sin ` A ) x. ( cos ` B ) ) = ( ( ( sin ` ( A + B ) ) + ( sin ` ( A - B ) ) ) / 2 ) ) |
